Thoughtworks via Geektrust.name: Kroger Customers Tech - Checkout – Flash Sale and Analytics, Jan2022 – current
Thoughtworks via Geektrust.desc:
This project is about the flash sale items alongside checkout while shopping.
We present flash sales to users on discounts, and they can order it. The nodebased rest apis are same serving iOS, Android, Web (react based) platforms.

Thoughtworks via Geektrust.name: FAB (First Abu Dhabi Bank, Colleague Experience Portal), Oct2021 – Jan2022
Thoughtworks via Geektrust.desc:
The client FAB has various distributed systems in various legacy tech stack
and has a need to have a single collaborative colleagues’ platform to access
all such systems under one roof for better management of clients, accounts,
and their banking interactions. They are using MS Dynamics and PowerApp
platform to achieve the system output at segregated level. We have used the
stack with a mix of vanilla web + react components to make a single
collaborative platform to simplify workflows.

Natwest Group (former Royal Bank of Scot.name: CeX / RfX, Natwest Group, Mar2021 - Sep2021
Natwest Group (former Royal Bank of Scot.desc:
These projects are regression projects for Risk Based Markets Economic factors and
    produce risk weights on scenario variables. To achieve this, we hook univar and moody’s
    analytics APIs and get data snapshots and do regression & analytics over it. We used
    internal SSO, python3, django, django-rest, postgres and React.Js to achieve the output

Natwest Group (former Royal Bank of Scot.name: Smart Disability Initiatives, Natwest Group, Aug2020 - Jan2021
Natwest Group (former Royal Bank of Scot.desc:
I have opted to be in the disability initiative and contributed by making one social network
platform for disabled carers and NGOs and CII-IBDN indian government body and native
app for the BDF(Business Disability Forum) group in the UK

Natwest Group (former Royal Bank of Scot.name: Arria NLG Budgets and Forecasts Narratives, Jul2019 - Nov2020
Natwest Group (former Royal Bank of Scot.desc:
This project was intended for automatic commentary / notes / narratives generation from
bank statement reports using Arria.com NLG platform and using Tableau UI /
dashboarding capabilities.

Natwest Group (former Royal Bank of Scot.name: Finance Portal, Apr2016 - Jul2018
Natwest Group (former Royal Bank of Scot.desc:
Across the Bank, for statutory / regulatory needs, the project uses standard and
configurable reports approach to building disclosures using MVC, Python3 & Tornado, Javascript, React/Html5 and Sql & PlSql in Oracle 11g.

Natwest Group (former Royal Bank of Scot.name: CNMS - Cash Nostro Management System, Oct2011 - Jan2015
Natwest Group (former Royal Bank of Scot.desc:
Soap implemented, python proxy server, acts as middleware, the aim was to have a single instance accessing
RBS cash balances server and can give relevant data to authorized clients identified by
IPs.

Miscellaneous: L3 support, non technology / reporting / migration projects
SDLC: requirements gathering, analysis, design, coding, testing, deployment and support
Others: Library Management, PRVit, MDO, iPub, few automation tools in excel
